title: Advanced Mathematics Concept Course Utilizing Robotics and Block-Based Programming

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics (coordinate systems, functions) and fundamental programming concepts
context.additional_context: Activity-based learning environment using real-time video conferencing tools, robot simulation, and block coding via personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Students enhance their ability to apply Cartesian coordinate systems in 2D/3D spaces through robot control simulations.
Learners can visualize and represent mathematical problem-solving algorithms using block-based programming.
Participants can explain the practical applicability of abstract mathematical concepts through case analyses in robotics.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
